Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no concrete evidence provided to verify that the rodents were indeed in a takeout window at Charles de Gaulle airport.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the rodents in the video are at Charles de Gaulle airport without providing substantial evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by Paris Aéroport, the official account for the main Paris-region airports, denying that the video was taken at Charles de Gaulle airport.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Paris Aéroport has denied the video being taken at Charles de Gaulle airport.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in the provided claim.
